title: 5x5game
body: A game which is developed to be used in my master thesis at NTNU, fall 2023

title: F1 iCalendar
body: Parse formula 1 races for the current season into a iCalendar file, which can be imported into any calendar

title: Overtakst API
body: A service which gathers listing price as well as sale price for for a given apartment, calculates the difference and stores it in a database

title: NTNU Online Webcalendar
body: Webcal for events hosted by NTNU Online

title: NTNU Online Event Notifier
body: Event notifier for events hosted by Online
